text: Pähl am Ammersee is a municipality in Weilheim-Schongau in Bavaria, Germany. It is on the lake of Ammersee to the southwest of Munich. == Famous people == * Thomas Müller, footballer for Bayern Munich and Germany, grew up in the area. *Franz-Ludwig Schenk Graf von Stauffenberg, lawyer, birthplace of his wife in this area. * Duchess Sophie Charlotte in Bavaria met Edgar Hanfstaengl there. == References == Category:Weilheim-Schongau
title: Pähl
